body.name: HAUSHECK Twin Bunk Beds for 2 Kids/Adults, Twin Over Twin Bunk Bed w/Two Side Ladders & Full-Length Guardrails, Space-Saving Detachable Metal Bedframe No Box Spring Needed for Dorm, Bedroom
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 9 hrs 50 mins
features: ➤【TWIN OVER TWIN BUNK BED】Overall dimensions: 78''L x 41.50'' W x 65.20'' H. Upper bunk holds 400 lbs, lower bunk holds 400 lbs. Box Spring Not Required. 【EASY ASSEMBLY】The twin metal bunk bed frame comes flat-packed with essential tool in one box for easy home assembly.

➤【DETACHABLE BUNK BED FOR 2 KIDS】This metal bunk bed can be converted in to two individual beds. A perfect addition for growing teens, allowing them the freedom and space to host friends. When there are lots of family members or a lot of kids then a l bunk bed could be just the right choice for Space-Saving.

➤【UNDERBED STORAGE SPACES】- The bottom bunk clearance is 13.1 inches, you can put a storage box under the bed to tidy up the clothes, toys or quilts. which is easy to move, access, and place storage boxes, quilts, clothes, toys and make your room look more clean and neat

➤【TWO SIDE LADDERS & FULL-LENGTH RAILS】Upper bunk's safety rail is 11.7''-height, high enough to protect from accidently falling off. There are 2 built-in side ladders to ensure easier access to the top bunk, while full-length safety rails around the top bunk protect people from falling off.

➤【METAL FRAME】This twin over twin bunk bed is made of quality tested steel frame with built-in reinforced metal slats for tremendous support, anti-rust powder coated finish, eliminating excess wobbling. The twin frame definitely stands the test of time.
body.description: Features:Able to split: This metal bunk bed can be converted in to two individual beds. A perfect addition for growing teens, allowing them the freedom and space to host friends. Upper bunk's safety rail is 11.7''-height, high enough to protect from accidently falling off.Space-saving Design: Twin over Twin Bunk beds is simply a great solution for situation in which space needs to be saved. When there are lots of family members or a lot of kids then a l bunk bed could be just the right choice for the whole family. allow for enough room to play around.Easy Assembly: The twin bunk bed frame comes flat-packed with essential tool in one box for easy home assembly. All parts are clearly labeled, easy to assemble with clear installation instructions.Metal Frame Twin Bed: The bunk bed with stairs is made of sturdy metal with built-in reinforced metal slats for tremendous support. The twin frame definitely stands the test of time. Upper bunk holds 400 lbs, lower bunk holds 400 lbs.Safety and Security: There are 2 built-in side ladders to ensure easier access to the top bunk, while full-length safety rails around the top bunk protect people from falling off.

reviews.reviewText: No me agrada que no cumple las condiciones que describía en ese publicación; No sirve no 👎 se quebró desde la soldadura y el peso es de un niño intento subir , no rocomiendo este producto no es seguro ….
